quote: And I breathe large at home. I drop my cloak,Unclasp my girdle, loose the band that tiesMy hair...now could I but unloose my soul!We are sepulchred alive in this close world,And want more room.
quote_letters: AND I BREATHE LARGE AT HOME I DROP MY CLOAKUNCLASP MY GIRDLE LOOSE THE BAND THAT TIESMY HAIRNOW COULD I BUT UNLOOSE MY SOULWE ARE SEPULCHRED ALIVE IN THIS CLOSE WORLDAND WANT MORE ROOM
